channel.title: Lecture Videos on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Lecture Videos on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: 6002_l1.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics administrivia, what is engineering, lumped circuit abstraction and lumped matter discipline.

item.title: 6002_l10.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics MOSFET amp and amplifiers.

item.title: 6002_l11.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics small signal notation, small signal circuit view, small signal circuit analysis and dc supply.

item.title: 6002_l12.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics motivation, capacitor, ideal linear capacitor and rc circuit.

item.title: 6002_l13.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics equivalent circuit, falling delay and thevenin replacement.

item.title: 6002_l14.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics rc circuit, digital memory, memory abstraction and truth table for decoder.

item.title: 6002_l15.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics second order systems, observed output, lc network and plotting the total solution.

item.title: 6002_l16.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics motivation, rc network and sinusoidal steady state.

item.title: 6002_l17.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics complex algebra, frequency view and the impedance model.

item.title: 6002_l18.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics filter, low pass filter, combining impedances and high pass filter.

item.title: 6002_l19.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics amplifier abstraction, operational amplifier and noninverting amplifier.

item.title: 6002_l2.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics lumped matter discipline, demo circuit, 2KVLa and KCL example.

item.title: 6002_l20.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics digital-to-analog converters, filters, clock generators, amplifiers, adders and integrators and differentiators.

item.title: 6002_l21.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics negative vs positive feedback, hysteresis and oscillator.

item.title: 6002_l22.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics MOSFET gates, inverter and equivalent circuit.

item.title: 6002_l23.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics inverter, n-channel MOSFET (NFET) and p-channel MOSFET (PFET)

item.title: 6002_l24.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics power conversion circuits (pcc), piecewise?linear analysis and half-wave rectifier.

item.title: 6002_l25.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics the double take, the double dip, drop across inductor and the double jump.

item.title: 6002_l3.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics linearity, the thevenin method, homogeneity and superposition.

item.title: 6002_l4.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics discretize value, value discretization, voltage thresholds and logic values.

item.title: 6002_l5.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics static discipline, electrical analogy and MOSFET inverter.

item.title: 6002_l6.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics discretize matter, nonlinear analysis and incremental analysis.

item.title: 6002_l7.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics nonlinear analysis, analytical method, graphical method and incremental analysis.

item.title: 6002_l8.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics nonlinear circuits, linear response, dependent sources and amplifiers.

item.title: 6002_l9.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics MOSFET, amplifier and large signal analysis of amplifier.

item.title: demo_01.pdf
item.description: This resource is a demo file.

item.title: demo_02.pdf
item.description: This resource is a demo file.

item.title: demo_03.pdf
item.description: This resource is a demo file.

item.title: demo_04.pdf
item.description: This resource is a demo file.

item.title: demo_05.pdf
item.description: This resource is a demo file.

item.title: demo_05a.pdf
item.description: This resource is a demo file.

item.title: demo_06.pdf
item.description: This resource is a demo file.

item.title: demo_07.pdf
item.description: This resource is a demo file.

item.title: demo_08.pdf
item.description: This resource is a demo file.

item.title: demo_09.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo which shows the amplification of small waveforms using a MOSFET, along with the limitations of such an amplifier.

item.title: demo_10.pdf
item.description: This recource contains a demo presenting a picture of the MOSFET amplifier behavior by displaying a load line over a set of (premade) MOSFET i-v curves.

item.title: demo_11.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo which examines gate delay using two cascaded MOSFET inverters, and also an RC circuit model.

item.title: demo_12.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo examining second order responses using two cascaded inverters.

item.title: demo_13.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo examining first order sinusoidal steady state responses of the inverting amplifier and an RC circuit.

item.title: demo_15.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo which looks at designs of digital memory using a capacitor and inverters (buffers).

item.title: demo_17.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo showing the behavior of an (inverting) op-amp integrator and differentiator.

item.title: demo_17a.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo showing how an RC circuit can approximate either an integrator (capacitor voltage at high frequencies) or a differentiator (resistor voltage at low frequencies).

item.title: demo_18.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo showing power consumption using MOSFET and RC Network.

item.title: demo_18rp.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo measuring the temperature of a CMOS inverter using a thermocouple and verifies that the dissipated power is proportional to Vs2 F, where Vs is the supply voltage, and F is the switching frequency.

item.title: demo_19.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo showing the capacitive coupling between signals on two separate wires in proximity.

item.title: demo_19a.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo showing the inductive effect of long wires by showing voltage spikes on a power supply with a long lead when steps in current occur (due to switching of an inverter state).

item.title: demo_19b.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demo showing the effects of delay (the speed of light not infinite), and that an open circuit does not always behave as stated in 6.002, various length cables are attached to a square wave input and the oscilloscope (also at the input).

item.title: demo_20.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demonstration showing the magnitude and phase plots for an RC lowpass filter on the Dynamic Signal Analyzer. Also allow students to hear the sine tone.

item.title: demo_21.pdf
item.description: This resource contains circuit diagrams on schmitt trigger.

item.title: demo_21rp.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics oscilloscope setup, waveform generator setup, power supply setup and circuit diagrams.

item.title: demo_22.pdf
item.description: This resource contains a demonstration showing the magnitude and phase plots for an RLC bandpass filter on the Dynamic Signal Analyzer.

item.title: demo_23.pdf
item.description: This resource contains domonstration on resonant LC circuit.

item.title: demo_24.pdf
item.description: This resource contains domonstration on opamp.

item.title: demo_25.pdf
item.description: This resource contains characteristic of diode circuits and waveforms.

item.title: demo_26.pdf
item.description: This resource contains waveforms of RC response.

item.title: demo_27.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on topics demonstrates an RLC filter to pickup AM radio, circuit diagrams and waveforms.

item.title: demo_28.pdf
item.description: This resource contains input output waveforms of a boost converter.

item.title: Video Lectures
item.description: The course materials for 6.002 were last updated in Spring 2007. However, the lecture notes, demos, and videos presented in this section are taken from the Fall 2000 version. Video for Lecture 24 is not available. Resources from this session may be found alongside the materials from Lecture 25: Violating the Abstraction Barrier. Lecture 1: Introduction and Lumped Abstraction Lecture 2: Basic Circuit Analysis Method Lecture 3: Superposition, Thévenin and Norton Lecture 4: The Digital Abstraction Lecture 5: Inside the Digital Gate Lecture 6: Nonlinear Analysis Lecture 7: Incremental Analysis Lecture 8: Dependent Sources and Amplifiers Lecture 9: Mosfet Amplifier Large Signal Analysis (part 1) Lecture 9: Mosfet Amplifier Large Signal Analysis (part 2) Lecture 10: Amplifiers - Small Signal Model Lecture 11: Small Signal Circuits Lecture 12: Capacitors and First-Order Systems Lecture 13: Digital Circuit Speed Lecture 14: State and Memory Lecture 15: Second-Order Systems (part 1) Lecture 15: Second-Order Systems (part 2) Lecture 16: Sinusoidal Steady State Lecture 17: The Impedance Model Lecture 18: Filters Lecture 19: The Operational Amplifier Abstraction Lecture 20: Operational Amplifier Circuits Lecture 21: Op Amps Positive Feedback Lecture 22: Energy and Power Lecture 23: Energy, CMOS Lecture 25: Violating the Abstraction Barrier
